verbose_text: They also failed to determine whether SHP-1 and SHP-2, which are structurally related and coexpressed in T cells, act in a redundant manner to mediate PD-1 coinhibition under physiological conditions, a key issue in view of a recent study suggesting that SHP-2 is dispensable for PD-1 coinhibition in vivo.
evidence: SHP-1 and SHP-2, which are structurally related and coexpressed in T cells, act in a redundant manner to mediate PD-1
